schema.description:
Report alarm to network manager.
Five type: common alarm, switch event, common event and performence alarm(digital or simulation).Every record is one of them.
common alarm --- flow-id/timestamp/code/severity/alarm-time/alarm-type/alarm-status/alarm-class/description/tpid-type/tpid/tpid-length/source-tpid-type/source-tpid/source-tpid-length.
performence alarm --- flow-id/timestamp/code/severity/alarm-time/alarm-type/alarm-status/alarm-class/description/tpid-type/tpid/tpid-length/source-tpid-type/source-tpid/source-tpid-length/perf-alarm-type/perf-alarm-period/perf-alarm-value.
switch event --- flow-id/timestamp/code/severity/alarm-time/alarm-type/alarm-status/alarm-class/description/protect-tpid-type/protect-tpid/protect-tpid-length/reason/return-mode/protect-group-work-status/swtich-tpid-type/previous-tpid/previous-tpid-length/current-tpid/current-tpid-length/protect-type.
common event --- flow-id/timestamp/code/severity/occurrence-time/alarm-class/description/tpid-type/tpid/tpid-length/reason.

occurrence-time.description: Occurrence time, UTC, second from 1970-1-1 00:00:00. This leaf is valid when alarm stat is occur.

update-time.description: Occur time, UTC, second from 1970-1-1 00:00:00. This leaf is valid when alarm stat is update.

caption.description: Alarm title. The 'caption' and 'description' together constitute a complete description of the alarm. That is, the complete description = 'caption' + 'description'.

tpid-type.description: The TPID type for alarm been detected.

tpid.description: The TPID for alarm been detected.

tpid-length.description: The TPID length for alarm been detected.

source-tpid-type.description: The TPID type of alarm from.

source-tpid-length.description: The TPID length of alarm from.

perf-alarm-value.description: The performance value when alarm occur. Length 10 bytes( see document).

reason.description: Reason code for switch-event or common event. Reason code see document.

swtich-tpid-type.description: The TPID type be protected. That's the TPID type of previos and current.

current-tpid-length.description: The destination TPID length when protecting.

occurrence-ms.description: Occurrence millisecond. This leaf is valid when alarm stat is occur.

update-ms.description: Occur millisecond. This leaf is valid when alarm stat is update.

disappeared-ms.description: Disappear millisecond. This leaf is valid when alarm stat is disappear.

caption.description: Title for notification. The 'caption' and 'description' together constitute a complete description of the notification. That is, the complete description = 'caption' + 'description'.

tpid-type.description: The TPID type for alarm been detected.

tpid.description: The TPID for alarm been detected.

tpid-length.description: The TPID length for alarm been detected.

schema.description: When an alarm preload autorecover rule canceled, report it to network manager.

alarmMasks.description: Set some rules based TPID for mask alarm.

alarmMask.description: Set some rules based TPID for mask alarm.

checkPointType.description: The type of check point. Range 1~0xFFFF, 0xFFFF indicates any type.

checkPointTpid.description: TPID be masked. Length range is from 62 to 128 bytes.

tpidMask.description: Mask bit of attribute 'checkPointTpid'. Length is from 8 to16 bytes. 1 indicates that the corresponding byte is valid.

code.description: Alarm code for mask. Range 1~0xFFFFFFFF ,0xFFFFFFFF for any code.

tpidType.description: The type of check point. Range 1~0xFFFF, 0xFFFF indicates any type.

almRelayPara.description: Set relay time to alarm occur or disappear. Only support for NE.

state.description: State of performance threshold alarm switch.

severity.description: Severity level of the alarm code. If the customized alarm level of the product is any level in the 1-8 by default, the customized alarm level or above can be reported through netconf. The get node value is the customized alarm level. If the product has no customized default value, the get node value is off.

profile-name.description:
The alarm shield profile name.

These characters's ASCII unicode must be between 0x21-0x3E / 0x40-0x7E.

codes.description: Config alarm shield profile alarm codes.

code.description: Config alarm shield profile alarm code instance.
Alarm code. Range 1~0xFFFFFFFF, 0xFFFFFFFF for any code.

severity.description: The severity level of the alarm code modification.

apply-system.description: Set the shield for the whole system.

board.description: Set the shield for the board.

interface.description: Set the shield for the interface.

almLevel.description: For query severity level of alarm. Query condition: (1) code;(2)code+tpidType;(3)none for all.

tpidType.description: The TPID type for alarm been detected.

flowId.description: For query all alarm flow ID. Query condition: (1) almClass. (2) almFlwId + timeStamp. (3) sort

curRecords.description:
Used to search current alarm, and return type switching events. Query condition: almFlwId + timeStamp.
Four type: common alarm, protected switch event, and performence data alarm(digital or simulation).Every record is one of them.
common alarm --- almFlwId/timeStamp/code/severity/almTime/almType/almStat/almClass/description/TpidType/Tpid/srcTpidType/srcTpid/sort.
performence alarm --- almFlwId/timeStamp/code/severity/almTime/almType/almStat/almClass/description/TpidType/Tpid/srcTpidType/srcTpid/perfAlmType/threshAlmType/thPerfVal/sort.
protected switch event --- almFlwId/timeStamp/code/severity/almTime/almType/almStat/almClass/description/protectTpidType/protectTpid/reason/returnMode/prtGroupWrkStat/switchTpidType/previosTpid/currentTpid/protectType/sort.

almOccurTime.description: Occur time, UTC, second from 1970-1-1 00:00:00. This leaf is valid when alarm stat is occur.

almUpdateTime.description: Occur time, UTC, second from 1970-1-1 00:00:00. This leaf is valid when alarm stat is update.

caption.description: Alarm title. The 'caption' and 'description' together constitute a complete description of the alarm. That is, the complete description = 'caption' + 'description'.

tpidType.description: The TPID type for alarm been detected.

tpid.description: The TPID for alarm been detected.

tpidLen.description: The TPID length for alarm been detected.

srcTpidType.description: The TPID type of alarm from.

srcTpidLen.description: The TPID length of alarm from.

thPerfVal.description: The performance value when alarm occur. Length 10 bytes( see document).

reason.description: Reason code for switch-event or common event. Reason code see document.

swtichTpidType.description: The TPID type be protected. That's the TPID type of previosand current.

currentTpidLen.description: The destination TPID length when protecting.

almOccurMs.description: Occur millisecond. This leaf is valid when alarm stat is occur.

almUpdateMs.description: Occur millisecond. This leaf is valid when alarm stat is update.

hisRecords.description:
Used to search current alarm. 
Query condition: 
 (1) almFlwId + timeStamp.
 (2) almClass + beginTime + endTime. 
 (3) beginTime + endTime.
 (4) sort
Four type: common alarm, common event, switch event, and performence data alarm.Every record is one of them.
common alarm --- almFlwId/timeStamp/code/severity/almOccurTime/almDisappearTime/almUpdateTime/almType/almStat/almClass/description/TpidType/Tpid/srcTpidType/srcTpid/sort.
common event --- almFlwId/timeStamp/code/severity/almOccurTime/almClass/description/TpidType/Tpid/reason.
performence alarm --- almFlwId/timeStamp/code/severity/almOccurTime/almDisappearTime/almUpdateTime/almType/almStat/almClass/description/TpidType/Tpid/srcTpidType/srcTpid/perfAlmType/threshAlmType/thPerfVal/sort.
switch event --- almFlwId/timeStamp/code/severity/almOccurTime/almDisappearTime/almUpdateTime/almType/almStat/almClass/description/protectTpidType/protectTpid/reason/returnMode/prtGroupWrkStat/switchTpidType/previosTpid/currentTpid/protectType/sort.

almUpdateTime.description: Disappear time, UTC, second from 1970-1-1 00:00:00. Used when alarm status is update.

caption.description: Alarm title. The 'caption' and 'description' together constitute a complete description of the alarm. That is, the complete description = 'caption' + 'description'.

tpidType.description: The TPID type for alarm been detected.

tpid.description: The TPID for alarm been detected.

tpidLen.description: The TPID length for alarm been detected.

srcTpidType.description: The TPID type of alarm from.

srcTpidLen.description: The TPID length of alarm from.

thPerfVal.description: The performance value when alarm occur. Length 10 bytes( see document).

reason.description: Reason code for switch-event or common event. Reason code see document.

swtichTpidType.description: The TPID type be protected. That's the TPID type of previosand current.

currentTpidLen.description: The destination TPID length when protecting.

beginTime.description: The start time for search.When return is useless.

endTime.description: The end time for search.When return is useless.

record.description:
Used to search notification. 
Query condition: 
 (1) flwid + timestamp.
 (2) begin-time + end-time.
 (3) sort.
